dreisoft.tresos.guidedconfig.api.gui.form
Class SWTText

java.lang.Object
  dreisoft.tresos.guidedconfig.api.gui.form.SWTText
All Implemented Interfaces:
dreisoft.tresos.guidedconfig.api.gui.form.internal.ISWTWidgetElement, ISWTWidget
public class SWTText
extends java.lang.Object
implements ISWTWidget, dreisoft.tresos.guidedconfig.api.gui.form.internal.ISWTWidgetElement

This standard widget represents a text or number entry. The widget does not include a label. A text entry can be created with the following code snippet: 

 WidgetFactory factory = getWidgetFactory();
 factory.createLabel( parent, "TextWidgetId", "TextMementoId", "Text Label" );
 factory.createText( parent, "TextWidgetId", "TextMementoId", WidgetFactory.TextFormat.TEXT );

Copyright (C) Elektrobit Automotive GmbH - All rights reserved

Since:
2008.b
